message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer ensures you get a good chunk while I get a bit more.

Alice, I'm proposing a fair split that slightly favors me to account for the 20% inflation penalty I face. If we go to round 3, any money I receive will be worth even less to me, while yours retains full value. This is a reasonable offer that benefits us both.

Bob, it's clear we both want a larger piece of the pie.  I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial offer, but this is a fair deal considering the inflation working against you. Let's close this out.
